results.title: They Were Given IUDs as Children Without Their Consent. Now, They Want Compensation.
results.abstract: A group of Indigenous women in Greenland say Danish doctors inserted intrauterine devices without their consent. They are now seeking damages from the Danish government.

media.caption: Britta Mortensen told the AFP she was forced to have an IUD implanted, without her parents’ knowledge, while she was living at a boarding school in Greenland in 1974.
